title: Justin Trudeau - Students | Britannica Kids | Homework Help
snippet: When Justin Trudeau was six years old, his parents divorced. Trudeau earned a bachelor’s degree in English from McGill University in Montreal, Quebec, in 1994. He received a degree in education from the University of British Columbia in 1998.
